name: Devil's Dice
description:
This is a submission for Mini Jam 83: Dread. The limitation for this game was to include dice as a mechanic. 

This game is a bullet hell dungeon crawler where your life hinges on dice rolls. Every time you enter a room, dice are rolled. If you get hit after they finish rolling, they will be flipped to the next number. Once all three dice are showing 6, it's game over!

Other instructions are in-game.

This game has no audio, I didn't get to it in time :(. While playing, I recommend listening to rock, or some other fast-paced music that goes along with the vibe!

This game is entirely by me, except for the fonts which are a Kenney asset!
